PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CAROLINE LAJOIE of Qu√©bec, Quebec, to be a member of the Board of Directors of the National Capital Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective July 1, 2019, in the place of Carol Loughrey, whose term will expire.
